channel.title: Comments on: Prince album giveaway controversey

item.title: By: Ok, Prince is still awesome
item.dc:creator: Ok, Prince is still awesome
item.description: [...] mind his latest by the numbers pastiche of soul funk pop, Planet Earth, or how he chooses to distribute it. Prince is still a complete freak. The purple goblin has asked demanded that his hotel suite in [...]

item.title: By: Prince's "Guitar" is limp
item.dc:creator: Prince's "Guitar" is limp
item.description: [...] new record, Planet Earth, is out July 24 in the US on Sony/BMG. In England Prince signed a deal to give the album away free with the Daily Mail, which has made retailers none too pleased. But, at this point, what does [...]
